title: Flowmaster American Thunder Cat-back System - 2011-2016 GM 2500HD & 3500HD - 817541
description:
Questions? Give us a call (707) 544-4761
View this product: http://bit.ly/1jMmmDP
Visit Flowmaster's website: http://bit.ly/1fyGZRh

Flowmaster Part #817541

Application:
Fits 2011-2016 Chevrolet Silverado and GMC Sierra 2500HD Crew Cab, Standard 6.5 Bed models with 6.0L Gas engine.

Description:
Flowmaster's new American Thunder Cat-back exhaust system for the 2011-2016 Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra 2500HD/3500HD trucks with 6.0L V8 is perfect for the person looking for a moderate to aggressive sound level inside and outside of the truck, with all of the performance benefits that you would expect from Flowmaster.  Designed for the Crew Cab, Standard Bed (6.5') models only, this bolt-on, emissions-legal system features a stainless steel 50 Series HD muffler and dual 3.00" DOR/S (Dual Out Rear/ Dual Out Side) stainless steel mandrel bent tailpipes.  The system is finished off with beautifully polished 4.00" stainless steel tips. The exhaust system is manufactured in the USA and is covered by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty.  Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation.

✓ Stainless Steel Construction
✓ Multiple Exit Styles Provided in Kit
✓ Patented Delta Flow Technology
✓ Lifetime Limited Warranty
